policies.name: Standard Borrowing
policies.description: Standard borrowing policy with 2-week loan period

policies.name: Fines and Fees
policies.description: Policy regarding late returns, lost items, and other fines

policies.name: Membership Terms
policies.description: Terms and conditions for library membership

policies.name: Book Reservation
policies.description: Policy for reserving books that are currently checked out

notification_templates.name: Checkout Confirmation
notification_templates.subject: Book Checkout Confirmation
notification_templates.body:
Hello {{user.first_name}},

You have successfully checked out the following book(s):
{% for book in books %}- {{book.title}} (Due: {{book.due_date|date:"F j, Y"}})
{% endfor %}

Thank you for using our library!

notification_templates.name: Due Date Reminder
notification_templates.subject: Upcoming Book Due Date
notification_templates.body:
Hello {{user.first_name}},

The following book(s) are due soon:
{% for book in books %}- {{book.title}} (Due: {{book.due_date|date:"F j, Y"}})
{% endfor %}

Please return or renew them to avoid late fees.

notification_templates.name: Overdue Notice
notification_templates.subject: Overdue Book Notice
notification_templates.body:
Hello {{user.first_name}},

The following book(s) are overdue:
{% for book in books %}- {{book.title}} (Due: {{book.due_date|date:"F j, Y"}})
{% endfor %}

Please return them as soon as possible to avoid additional fines.

notification_templates.name: Welcome Email
notification_templates.subject: Welcome to Our Library!
